title: Recommended Performance Settings for AMD Radeon R5 M430 Graphics?
body: Sorry, I don't really know much about this stuff. Does anyone else happen to have the same graphics? What are the recommended setting for the highest performance for this card. I don't care about aesthetics.

replies.body:
For the best performance, we actually suggest not enforcing settings via your graphics control panel and instead, letting League take the wheel and tweak with your settings in-game under the **VIDEO** menu.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
